1.content: After finishing their role, who finds themselves changing?
1.title: Who will gain?

154.content: Maybe a set of Chrises start gaining together?
154.title: Couple of Chris

choices: One of the Chrises gets in an accident
1541.content:
"I'm so glad to be out of that suit!" Evans stretched.
"You're telling me. I'm ready to let loose." Hemsworth agreed. "Want to go out to celebrate the end of an era?"
"Sounds good to me. I've been craving steak for weeks!"
"That sounds great! Mind if I come?" Robert poked his head around the makeup station.
"Sure. We can all go! Sound good to you Scarlet, Jeremy?"
"Definitely. You can count me in." Scarlet grins.
"Can't. Have to maintain my diet for my show after all." Jeremy clicks.
"I'll invite Mark on the way out."
"Thanks Chris." Hemsworth said. "The Ranch at 7 sound good to everyone?"
Everyone nodded and went there own ways until dinner.
1541.title: End of An Era

1543.content: How about a blast from the past?
1543.title: No Thanks

15433.content: Perhaps they aren't from Hollywood but are online celebrities.
15433.title: Go digital

info.brief_description: Men of Hollywood start gaining weight.
info.description:
After their movie roles end, these actors find it hard to maintain their physiques. Who will you follow? Why are they changing? How will they gain?

-Some mutual gaining is allowed but make the actor the main focus.
-Magic is allowed but keep it to a minimum. No "he gained 200 pounds instantly" stuff.
-No vore, or toilet stuff.
-No graphic sex scenes. Slight sex is okay but don't go into to much detail.
-They can get smaller too but not beyond average size of adults (so no making Chris Hemsworth 4'3" or Tom Cruise is 82 pounds. Those aren't average sizes of people)
-Posts should be at least a paragraph unless just starting a storyline.
